data.name: Twice Reborn: a vampire visual novel Demo
data.detailed_description:
***DEMO IS CURRENTLY ONLY AVAILABLE IN ENGLISH, SPANISH, KOREAN, AND CHINESE. RUSSIAN TRANSLATION COMING SOON***

WISHLIST TODAY!

If you crossed a vampire, would you protect humanity or embrace the blood?


In Twice Reborn, Mark Delaware a teaching assistant, becomes a newly-turned vampire in a community forced to hide in plain sight. His mentor, Michelson, has trusted Mark to become the Enforcer: a feared arbiter who keeps the quarreling vampiric houses following the Code. When arson kills key vampires in the community, it's up to Mark to either embrace his blood or to find a way to--somehow--regain his humanity.

There Are Sacrifices to Make

Interacting with humans and vampires is a delicate balance. Not all appreciate Mark's decision and not all relationships can last. Some want him dead, others want him for their own. Mark's responses in the perilous community changes their reactions as well as the story's routes/endings. Will he survive?

Survive the Night

Satiate Mark's bloodlust, otherwise he may kill innocents. The opportunities for blood will not always be private nor moral.

Not all are who they seem to be.



About this demo

This a demo of two of the early chapters in Twice Reborn. The completed game will have:

A fully voiced cast of 30+ characters (audio dialogue is in English)
A reputation system among friends, factions
30+ possible endings within the 95,000 word manuscript

And remember: don't get too thirsty!



To be released for Windows and Mac

Advisory Warning:

Contains flashing images, violence, moderate language, drugs/alcohol usage. Not suitable for all ages.

Help support in English only.
